function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of psychological distance and its impact on contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Misinterpretation of spatial and social interactions could lead to ineffective disease control measures","Mitigation":"Education and training on the concept of psychological distance and its relevance to disease control","Technologies":"Educational materials, training programs","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, community leaders","Owner":"Educational institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of construal levels leading to misaligned disease control strategies","Impact":"Inappropriate allocation of resources and implementation of ineffective disease control measures","Mitigation":"Training and awareness programs on construal level theory and its implications for disease control","Technologies":"Training modules, educational workshops","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, community leaders","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Failure to consider psychological distance in communication and public health messaging","Impact":"Ineffective communication leading to misunderstanding and lack of compliance with disease control measures","Mitigation":"Development of communication strategies that align with different construal levels and psychological distances","Technologies":"Targeted messaging, communication tools, behavioral science techniques","People":"Health communication specialists, public health officials, community leaders","Owner":"Public health organizations, communication agencies"}]}
